meta.hint:
A subject pronoun tells who is doing something. It is usually at the beginning of the sentence. The subject pronouns are I, you, he, she, it, we, and they. Example - I met Rick. Example - They helped Stan.
An object pronoun comes after an action verb. The object pronouns are me, you, him, her, it, us, and them. Example - Rick met me. Example - Stan helps them.
meta.question: Complete the sentence with the best pronoun.
